CurrentVersion.title: Office App: Idle Session Timeout for Microsoft 365 Web Apps - Government Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Idle session timeout feature allows IT admins to configure a tenant-wide timeout value based on which users get automatically signed out after a period of inactivity on Microsoft 365 web apps. This feature is an improvement over, and will eventually replace, current idle timeout settings in Outlook Web App (OWA) and SharePoint Online (SPO).

This feature is an improvement over, and will eventually replace, current idle timeout settings in Outlook Web App (OWA) and SharePoint Online (SPO).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Quick Policies enhancements
CurrentVersion.description:
Enhancements to Insider Risk Management quick policies onboarding experience will enable administrators to create a policy with a new one-step process. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance: Enhanced Policy Conditions
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this new feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Junk/Phishing reporting actions integrated with Microsoft Defender in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in classic Outlook for Windows can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: DocuSign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also DocuSign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by DocuSign and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Restricted SharePoint Search
CurrentVersion.description: ,Restricted SharePoint Search (RSS) is a setting that will allow Global/Tenant and SharePoint Admins to disable organization-wide search and select a set of curated SharePoint sites. These selected sites, along with the users’ OneDrive files and content, will then become accessible in search and in the Copilot experiences. This means that whether you have Enterprise Search or Restricted SharePoint Search enabled, users in your organization will still be able to interact with their OneDrive information in Copilot.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Restricted SharePoint Search
OldVersion.description: ,Restricted SharePoint Search (RSS) is a setting that will allow Global/Tenant and SharePoint Admins to disable organization-wide search and select a set of curated SharePoint sites. These selected sites, along with the users’ OneDrive files and content, will then become accessible in search and in the Copilot experiences. This means that whether you have Enterprise Search or Restricted SharePoint Search enabled, users in your organization will still be able to interact with their OneDrive information in Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
OldVersion.description: ,To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town Hall Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams town hall Graph APIs allow users to create, update, and delete town hall events.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town Hall Graph APIs
OldVersion.description: The Teams town hall Graph APIs allow users to create, update, and delete town hall events.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint Pages: New Section Level Content Align
CurrentVersion.description: With Section Level Content Align, authors will now be able to center and bottom align all the webparts within a single section. This will make it easier for all of the columns in your section to be visually harmonious and reduce the need for the spacer webpart.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint Pages: New Section Level Content Align
OldVersion.description: With Section Level Content Align, authors will now be able to center and bottom align all the webparts within a single section. This will make it easier for all of the columns in your section to be visually harmonious and reduce the need for the spacer webpart.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Improvements to “Deleting of SharePoint files/folders” indicators
CurrentVersion.description: ,Today “Deleting of SharePoint files” and “Deleting of SharePoint folders” indicators include permanent file or folder deletion event operations FileDeleted and FolderDeleted respectively. With this update, these indicators also capture files/folders moved to recycle bin which includes FileRecycled, FolderRecycled. You will see more activities being captured by these indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

With this update, these indicators also capture files/folders moved to recycle bin which includes FileRecycled, FolderRecycled. You will see more activities being captured by these indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Autofill columns
CurrentVersion.description: This allows SharePoint Premium users to add natural language prompts to document library columns to extract or generate metadata from an uploaded file's contents.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Autofill columns
OldVersion.description: This allows SharePoint Premium users to add natural language prompts to document library columns to extract or generate metadata from an uploaded file's contents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Programmatic Desktop Sharing
CurrentVersion.description: With desktop sharing (made available OOB), meeting presenters can now screen-share all their meeting apps directly onto the stage for improved collaboration. We are introducing programmatic desktop sharing, which allows developers to enable screensharing specific pieces of app content. Unlike the currently existing share to stage functionality, meeting participants cannot interact with the shared app; they have a view-only mode of the presenter's app screen similar to screen sharing, but in one click. The shared content is also automatically captured in the meeting recording. This works great for co-consumption scenarios and requires little developer investment.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Programmatic Desktop Sharing
OldVersion.description: With desktop sharing (made available OOB), meeting presenters can now screen-share all their meeting apps directly onto the stage for improved collaboration. We are introducing programmatic desktop sharing, which allows developers to enable screensharing specific pieces of app content. Unlike the currently existing share to stage functionality, meeting participants cannot interact with the shared app; they have a view-only mode of the presenter's app screen similar to screen sharing, but in one click. The shared content is also automatically captured in the meeting recording. This works great for co-consumption scenarios and requires little developer investment.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Premium content AI Graph API in Beta (formerly known as Syntex)
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are releasing new Graph APIs for SharePoint Premium content AI capabilities in Beta (formerly known as Syntex models). You will be able to build applications using these new Graph API calls: get a Syntex model by its name, get a Syntex model by its ID, apply a Syntex model to document libraries, un-apply a Syntex model from document libraries, list all the applied document libraries of a Syntex model, create a document processing job, and get a document processing job.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Premium content AI Graph API in Beta (formerly known as Syntex)
OldVersion.description: ,We are releasing new Graph APIs for SharePoint Premium content AI capabilities in Beta (formerly known as Syntex models). You will be able to build applications using these new Graph API calls: get a Syntex model by its name, get a Syntex model by its ID, apply a Syntex model to document libraries, un-apply a Syntex model from document libraries, list all the applied document libraries of a Syntex model, create a document processing job, and get a document processing job.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

OldVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

CurrentVersion.description: Provide Engage admins and Global admins the ability to manage Viva Engage without a licensed account.

OldVersion.description: Provide Engage admins and Global admins the ability to manage Viva Engage without a licensed account.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Shortcuts to copy and paste emails (Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V) in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to copy and paste emails in Outlook using the shortcuts Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V, allowing them to quickly transfer emails to the desired folder, streamlining workflow, and enhancing productivity. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-app feedback experience and policies for Desktop & Web clients
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the Settings menu for “Help & Feedback” and the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience for Teams Desktop & Web clients. Teams Desktop and Web clients will no longer use Microsoft Teams feedback policies for the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience, and instead use the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Cloud Policy service audit logs for policy changes
CurrentVersion.description: Activities performed by administrators within the Cloud Policy service, like editing a policy configuration, will generate Audit logs stored in Purview Audit and will be accessible by Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users.

OldVersion.description: Activities performed by administrators within the Cloud Policy service, like editing a policy configuration, will generate Audit logs stored in Purview Audit and will be accessible by Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New RSVP settings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Two new settings to improve the user experience when responding to meeting invitations: (1) do not delete invitation email after RSVPing and (2) auto-decline if the attendee's calendar shows as busy. These features will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

With this change, customers can now create blanket custom retention policies which will apply to all Audit recordTypes. This capability will become available in addition to the existing support of manually selecting specific recordTypes in the custom policy.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Change to shared folder experience in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: We're making a change to the shared folder experience in OneDrive. Currently, when a user opens a shared folder in OneDrive, they are taken to a view of that folder within the sharers OneDrive. In the new experience, opening a shared folder will take the user to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This view, organized by people, shows and allows access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Change to shared folder experience in OneDrive
OldVersion.description: We're making a change to the shared folder experience in OneDrive. Currently, when a user opens a shared folder in OneDrive, they are taken to a view of that folder within the sharers OneDrive. In the new experience, opening a shared folder will take the user to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This view, organized by people, shows and allows access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Rename general channel
CurrentVersion.description: In our efforts to bridge the gaps between general and other channels, introducing the ability to rename the general channel in your team. General channel in a team can be renamed by the team owner, or member (if they have permissions), to show up in the teams and channels list in alphabetical order.

CurrentVersion.description: When meeting window is minimized, participants can enlarge the small view of Teams meeting to a new bigger gallery view, making it easier to multitask on screen and stay aware of meeting events. Users can choose the size of the minimized gallery view window from the following options: one participant visible in the minimized window, 4 participants visible in the minimized window, fully minimized, or fully expanded.

CurrentVersion.description: You will now have the flexibility to show or hide (turn off/turn on) discover feed. Users can access this new toggle from the general settings section.

OldVersion.description: You will now have the flexibility to show or hide (turn off/turn on) discover feed. Users can access this new toggle from the general settings section.

CurrentVersion.description: On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Create EPM rules based on a support approve requests and reporting entries
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now create rules directly from support approval requests and from entries in the elevation report. Previously rules had to be created by hand by entering in all the information about the elevation and how it should be managed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Improved elevation detection
CurrentVersion.description: ,This improvement expands the types of elevation actions in Windows that EPM can detect and control elevation for.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Text Resizing for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can adjust the text size on the front-of-room display by adjusting the display scaling using Windows display scaling settings or XML settings, providing greater accessibility options. Changing the display scaling percentage also affects the size of other UI elements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set work location on bookable desks
CurrentVersion.description: The user's work location can be automatically set to 'In the office' upon plug-in to peripherals at a bookable desk. Once IT enables the policy for a tenant or a group, users can opt-in to automatically update their location making it easier to connect with co-workers when they are in the office.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: SharePoint Embed Support for Teams town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now embed Teams town halls in the SharePoint sites they manage. This capability allows town hall attendees to watch the event instance within a particular SharePoint site.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background on Teams panels
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators can upload and set custom background images for Teams panels through the Teams admin center, enabling them to reflect their organization's branding. This feature will be available for Teams Rooms Pro and Teams Shared Devices licensed panels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Administrative Units for Teams Administration
CurrentVersion.description: We are excited to announce the availability of administrative units (AUs) for Teams administration. AUs are a way to delegate admin roles and delegate administration to a subset of users in your organization, based on attributes such as department, location, or business unit. With AUs, you can create more granular and flexible management scenarios for your Teams environment. You can assign the following roles, allowing them to manage only the users, groups & devices within their AU: Teams Administrator Teams Device Administrator Teams Communication Administrator Teams Communication Support Engineer Teams Communication Support Specialist Teams Telephony Administrator

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Choose custom images as icons for resources in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Operators will be able to add custom images as icons to links located in resources in Viva Connections!

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Playlist Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows tenant admins to create a card for a playlist to be accessed from the Viva Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Barriers v2 support for all new onboarding customers
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Information Barriers v2 (IB v2) is now available for all new onboarding customers. IB v2 has enhanced architecture which enables the following new features:

Large-scale segment support: The segment limit in organizations has increased to 5,000.
Multi-segment support: Users can be assigned to up to 10 segments.
Flexible user discoverability: Organizations can now choose to allow IB-protected users to discover each other while adhering to IB communication and collaboration policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Windows app - New protected virtual printer
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the new virtual printer for OneNote Windows app, built on top of the Microsoft IPP class print driver. This printer will be compliant and functional with Widows Protected Print (WPP) mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner App for Teams in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Planner app in Teams is a single, unified work management experience. It brings together the simplicity of To Do, the collaboration of Planner and the power of Project for the web into a single and simple solution, that offers individual task management, collaborative work management as well as enterprise work management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Loop components in Teams chat for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Loop components in Teams chat allow end users to send a message with a table, action items or a list that can be co-authored and edited by everyone in line.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Loop components in Teams chat for GCC
OldVersion.description: Loop components in Teams chat allow end users to send a message with a table, action items or a list that can be co-authored and edited by everyone in line.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web settings. If a reset is done in web, this will affect the account across Outlook.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
OldVersion.description: Allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web settings. If a reset is done in web, this will affect the account across Outlook.

CurrentVersion.title: Office App: Idle Session Timeout for Microsoft 365 Web Apps - Government Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Idle session timeout feature allows IT admins to configure a tenant-wide timeout value based on which users get automatically signed out after a period of inactivity on Microsoft 365 web apps. This feature is an improvement over, and will eventually replace, current idle timeout settings in Outlook Web App (OWA) and SharePoint Online (SPO).

CurrentVersion.title: Office App: Idle Session Timeout for Microsoft 365 Web Apps - Government Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Idle session timeout feature allows IT admins to configure a tenant-wide timeout value based on which users get automatically signed out after a period of inactivity on Microsoft 365 web apps. This feature is an improvement over, and will eventually replace, current idle timeout settings in Outlook Web App (OWA) and SharePoint Online (SPO).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Quick Policies enhancements
CurrentVersion.description:
Enhancements to Insider Risk Management quick policies onboarding experience will enable administrators to create a policy with a new one-step process. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New SharePoint Start
CurrentVersion.description: New SharePoint start experience aims to inspire content creators to use their platform. By emphasizing a user-friendly approach that minimizes clicks, it's now easier to create websites, pages, news, and intranet content. Creators can return to the start experience hub to refine drafts, review past work, and monitor engagement metrics

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meet now in Teams group chat
CurrentVersion.description: Start a huddle with you colleagues using meet now in group chat. Meet now in group chat is a ringless experience designed to enable ad-hoc, real-time communication with your team in a hybrid environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Watermark support for recording playback (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Recording can now be enabled for watermarked meetings. An email ID will be displayed as the watermark during the meeting recording playback. Once a meeting has concluded, users can access the recorded content on both web and mobile platforms to watch the recording with watermarking.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
CurrentVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand. Note: We will not be rolling out to Government Clouds at this time.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
CurrentVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand. Note: We will not be rolling out to Government Clouds at this time.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance: Enhanced Policy Conditions
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: @ mentions within comments
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to @ mention users within comments on a whiteboard, with the associated in-app indicators to inform users of an @ mention.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Email notifications for @ mentions in comments on a whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description: The ability for @mentions within comments on a whiteboard to trigger an email notification to the user, with a link back to the @mention.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Keyword highlight support for document trainable classifiers
CurrentVersion.description: Highlight the keywords/phrases that are contributing significantly to the Trainable classifier results, so that users can easily understand the classification of the documents. This would build trust of the users of the OOB classifications and empower them to create DLP policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reporting improvements (Leverage policy insights)
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance message details report will support additional user filter to create and download the report for specific users in the policy. The items per policy report will provide item counts and actions on the items matched in the specified date range.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this new feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Domain/URL Update
CurrentVersion.description: To align the URL with the new Viva Engage branding and as part of the unified domain for Microsoft 365 initiative, Viva Engage’s URL schema is being updated. This change includes domains only. A separate roadmap will be created for email sender changes. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Define Shape Data in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to harness the full potential of shape data in Visio for the web. This powerful feature enables users to create custom data fields and associate them with shapes, simplifying the process of tracking and analyzing information in their diagrams.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Infinite Canvas in Visio for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Infinite canvas in Visio for the web is an expansive digital canvas designed to remove spatial limitations. It will allow users to stretch their creative boundaries by providing the room they need to capture, organize, and visualize ideas without constraints.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Admin apps pinned by default in Mail Compose and Read
CurrentVersion.description: When an app is deployed in Integrated Apps (Get Apps & Upload Custom LOB apps) in the Microsoft Admin Center, it will be available in Outlook on the web in Read Message Actions and Compose Ribbon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Limit Presenter Role Permissions
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a tenant configuration that admins can apply to limit user actions assigned to presenters in meetings. When enabled, presenters will no longer be able to control attendee mics and cameras, change the role of other participants, lower participants’ hands, and remove participants from the meeting. We want organizers to have control, flexibility, and structure in managing their meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Bulk export Learner Completion record
CurrentVersion.description: Learner Completion Record bulk export is an extension of an existing feature to download Learner record by username. Bulk export empowers enterprises to download learner records of multiple users in one go using the M365 groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Bulk export of learner completion records
CurrentVersion.description: Learner Completion Record bulk export is an extension of an existing feature to download Learner record by username. Bulk export empowers enterprises to download learner records of multiple users in one go using the M365 groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enhanced Policy Conditions
CurrentVersion.description: Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Junk/Phishing reporting actions integrated with Microsoft Defender in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in classic Outlook for Windows can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New VDI solution for Teams
CurrentVersion.description: New VDI solution for Teams is a redesigned version of the existing VDI solution, providing enhanced performance, reliability, and security. It offers additional features such as advanced meeting capabilities and a simpler app update experience for users. This Roadmap entry applies to Windows endpoints connecting to Azure Virtual Desktops, Windows 365 and Citrix VDI environments only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Graph Grounded Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot for answers grounded in your work content from the Microsoft Graph—your chats, documents, meetings, and emails—beyond your active Excel workbook. If you’re analyzing a workbook and want to enhance your understanding using information from another source in your tenant, just ask Copilot in Excel.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Custom image as Section Background
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint lets you customize the sections backgrounds with your own image. We've enhanced the focal point and introduced more settings like fill mode, overlay, opacity to help you adhere to accessibility best practices and make sure that your contents are clear and readable with customized background. This gives you more power over the image to make your page beautiful.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New options to copy email items in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're thrilled to introduce a new way to copy email items in the new Outlook for web and Windows that will make your email management even more seamless and efficient. Ctrl + Drag and Drop: Simply hold down the Ctrl key while dragging and dropping your email items to effortlessly duplicate them. It's a quick and intuitive way to manage your emails with precision. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Reactions in Town halls (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Participants can use reactions (like, love, applause, laugh, surprised) to express themselves during a town hall and the reactions appear as a continuous stream on the side of the screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ultrasound proximity join admin controls for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This roadmap item is cancelled and replaced by 380681. We are sorry for any inconvenience. IT admins can use XML files to enable two proximity join settings for Teams Rooms on Windows: enabling ultrasound signals for a user to accurately find and choose a room to join a meeting from, and whether the Teams Rooms automatically accepts the ring from the user's laptop to join the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative notes in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative notes allow meeting attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items.  Since Collaborative notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in.  Assigned Tasks in Collaborative notes automatically sync with ToDo & Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enriching Insider risk management with Communication compliance as an indicator
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enhance Insider Risk Management by incorporating communication compliance policy matches as a new indicator for detecting various communication risks, including inappropriate text. Additionally, our system now extends its capabilities to identify potential financial regulatory compliance breaches and violations of any custom communication compliance policy on Teams, Exchange, Yammer, Copilot for Microsoft 365, or third-party channels. This expansion ensures a comprehensive approach to risk detection in diverse communication scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enriching Insider risk management with Communication compliance as an indicator
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enhance Insider Risk Management by incorporating communication compliance policy matches as a new indicator for detecting various communication risks, including inappropriate text. Additionally, our system now extends its capabilities to identify potential financial regulatory compliance breaches and violations of any custom communication compliance policy on Teams, Exchange, Yammer, Copilot for Microsoft 365, or third-party channels. This expansion ensures a comprehensive approach to risk detection in diverse communication scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: DocuSign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also DocuSign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by DocuSign and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Adobe Acrobat Sign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also Adobe Acrobat sign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by Adobe and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: The new Microsoft Purview Portal entering GA
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Purview portal has a streamlined design and unified experience that helps you discover and access data security, data governance, and risk and compliance solutions for all your data, wherever it lives across your data estate. This means you can now access all Purview solutions in one single portal, as well as experiences such as settings, global search, recommendations, and roles and permissions management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Upload custom PowerPoint templates
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to upload custom PowerPoint templates for exports

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Support multitenancy organization via cross tenant sync
CurrentVersion.description: Enables one instance of Viva Glint to be used by employees in multiple M365 tenants

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP Analytics and Recommendations to understand risks, improve existing policies and improve posture
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview DLP overview page will have two new cards:  for DLP with 2 Cards that show Analytics with 1-click recommendations: Highlighting the key risk and the option to create a one-click policy to mitigate the risk, and Recommendation to fine tune existing DLP policies to make them effective and reduce alerts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multi-panel check-in on Teams panels
CurrentVersion.description: If a conference room has multiple panels deployed, admins can now enable check-in and room release for this room. The devices will stay in sync on the check-in status to ensure that the room is released or not released correctly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to Copy Rule
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this feature, admins will have capability to reuse existing rules and make slight edits instead of creating new rules from scratch every time. This will reduce a lot of manual re-work and boost their productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Restricted SharePoint Search
CurrentVersion.description: ,Restricted SharePoint Search (RSS) is a setting that will allow Global/Tenant and SharePoint Admins to disable organization-wide search and select a set of curated SharePoint sites. These selected sites, along with the users’ OneDrive files and content, will then become accessible in search and in the Copilot experiences. This means that whether you have Enterprise Search or Restricted SharePoint Search enabled, users in your organization will still be able to interact with their OneDrive information in Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town Hall Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams town hall Graph APIs allow users to create, update, and delete town hall events.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint Pages: New Section Level Content Align
CurrentVersion.description: With Section Level Content Align, authors will now be able to center and bottom align all the webparts within a single section. This will make it easier for all of the columns in your section to be visually harmonious and reduce the need for the spacer webpart.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Improvements to “Deleting of SharePoint files/folders” indicators
CurrentVersion.description: ,Today “Deleting of SharePoint files” and “Deleting of SharePoint folders” indicators include permanent file or folder deletion event operations FileDeleted and FolderDeleted respectively. With this update, these indicators also capture files/folders moved to recycle bin which includes FileRecycled, FolderRecycled. You will see more activities being captured by these indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Autofill columns
CurrentVersion.description: This allows SharePoint Premium users to add natural language prompts to document library columns to extract or generate metadata from an uploaded file's contents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Programmatic Desktop Sharing
CurrentVersion.description: With desktop sharing (made available OOB), meeting presenters can now screen-share all their meeting apps directly onto the stage for improved collaboration. We are introducing programmatic desktop sharing, which allows developers to enable screensharing specific pieces of app content. Unlike the currently existing share to stage functionality, meeting participants cannot interact with the shared app; they have a view-only mode of the presenter's app screen similar to screen sharing, but in one click. The shared content is also automatically captured in the meeting recording. This works great for co-consumption scenarios and requires little developer investment.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Premium content AI Graph API in Beta (formerly known as Syntex)
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are releasing new Graph APIs for SharePoint Premium content AI capabilities in Beta (formerly known as Syntex models). You will be able to build applications using these new Graph API calls: get a Syntex model by its name, get a Syntex model by its ID, apply a Syntex model to document libraries, un-apply a Syntex model from document libraries, list all the applied document libraries of a Syntex model, create a document processing job, and get a document processing job.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Admins/ Global admins do not require license to manage Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Provide Engage admins and Global admins the ability to manage Viva Engage without a licensed account.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Shortcuts to copy and paste emails (Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V) in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to copy and paste emails in Outlook using the shortcuts Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V, allowing them to quickly transfer emails to the desired folder, streamlining workflow, and enhancing productivity. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-app feedback experience and policies for Desktop & Web clients
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the Settings menu for “Help & Feedback” and the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience for Teams Desktop & Web clients. Teams Desktop and Web clients will no longer use Microsoft Teams feedback policies for the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience, and instead use the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Cloud Policy service audit logs for policy changes
CurrentVersion.description: Activities performed by administrators within the Cloud Policy service, like editing a policy configuration, will generate Audit logs stored in Purview Audit and will be accessible by Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share content from webapp (browser) to Teams chats, channels, and meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to share content from a standalone Teams webapp (from the browser) to Teams chats, channels and meetings (before and during the meeting).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New RSVP settings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Two new settings to improve the user experience when responding to meeting invitations: (1) do not delete invitation email after RSVPing and (2) auto-decline if the attendee's calendar shows as busy. These features will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook themes generated by Microsoft Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Make Outlook yours with themes generated by Copilot. You will be able to find these themes in Settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Blanket custom retention policies which apply to all Audit recordTypes
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Purview is enhancing the Audit custom retention policy experience. With this change, customers can now create blanket custom retention policies which will apply to all Audit recordTypes. This capability will become available in addition to the existing support of manually selecting specific recordTypes in the custom policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy "Curated by Microsoft" content provider support
CurrentVersion.description: This feature includes the ability to support external content including Copilot Lab resources, and enables you to find resources related to Copilot under the "AI and Copilot resources" provider. This new provider will power content for Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Change to shared folder experience in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: We're making a change to the shared folder experience in OneDrive. Currently, when a user opens a shared folder in OneDrive, they are taken to a view of that folder within the sharers OneDrive. In the new experience, opening a shared folder will take the user to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This view, organized by people, shows and allows access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Rename general channel
CurrentVersion.description: In our efforts to bridge the gaps between general and other channels, introducing the ability to rename the general channel in your team. General channel in a team can be renamed by the team owner, or member (if they have permissions), to show up in the teams and channels list in alphabetical order.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Viva –  Microsoft Copilot Dashboard in Viva Insights Product Updates
CurrentVersion.description: Adding trendlines to show metric movements over past 6-month time periods, before vs after Copilot comparisons, and providing the option to view an estimated dollar value for the existing Copilot assisted hours metric.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
CurrentVersion.description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Copilot in Microsoft Teams chat and channels to summarize content over a specified period of time
CurrentVersion.description: You can now ask Copilot in chat and channels to respond to questions regarding a conversation in a specific time period, for example: last month.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Creation and Registration APIs
CurrentVersion.description: Customers now have additional capabilities to manage Webinars, namely the ability to create, update, and delete Webinars, as well as register attendees to existing Webinars using a new set of APIs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New expanded gallery view option for minimized meeting window
CurrentVersion.description: When meeting window is minimized, participants can enlarge the small view of Teams meeting to a new bigger gallery view, making it easier to multitask on screen and stay aware of meeting events. Users can choose the size of the minimized gallery view window from the following options: one participant visible in the minimized window, 4 participants visible in the minimized window, fully minimized, or fully expanded.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights Copilot Dashboard delegation
CurrentVersion.description: Users can delegate access to the Copilot Dashboard to others within their company. Admins can set policies to manage access to the delegation feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Easier to find your most recent templates
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to the Viva Amplify template display include showing the most recently modified templates on the campaign overview page for easy access and separating the Viva Amplify provided templates from the user-saved campaign templates.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Ability to send dual- and triple-language surveys in emails
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Glint now supports sending survey emails in multiple languages within a single mailer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Longer documents can be summarized in chat
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word will be able to completely summarize documents that it could only partially summarize before. The upper limit is increasing to about four times more words.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Planner: eDiscovery Support for Microsoft Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Conduct a content search for eDiscovery and legal hold on Planner tasks in Microsoft Purview. The Planner data available for eDiscovery includes tasks shared with groups, along with the comments and attachments associated with those tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Avatar interaction improvements in Immersive space view
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing more avatar reactions and personal boundary on avatars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Show/hide discover feed
CurrentVersion.description: You will now have the flexibility to show or hide (turn off/turn on) discover feed. Users can access this new toggle from the general settings section.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Get started on a draft immediately with example prompts
CurrentVersion.description: On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
CurrentVersion.description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Create EPM rules based on a support approve requests and reporting entries
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now create rules directly from support approval requests and from entries in the elevation report. Previously rules had to be created by hand by entering in all the information about the elevation and how it should be managed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Improved elevation detection
CurrentVersion.description: ,This improvement expands the types of elevation actions in Windows that EPM can detect and control elevation for.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Text Resizing for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can adjust the text size on the front-of-room display by adjusting the display scaling using Windows display scaling settings or XML settings, providing greater accessibility options. Changing the display scaling percentage also affects the size of other UI elements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set work location on bookable desks
CurrentVersion.description: The user's work location can be automatically set to 'In the office' upon plug-in to peripherals at a bookable desk. Once IT enables the policy for a tenant or a group, users can opt-in to automatically update their location making it easier to connect with co-workers when they are in the office.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: SharePoint Embed Support for Teams town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now embed Teams town halls in the SharePoint sites they manage. This capability allows town hall attendees to watch the event instance within a particular SharePoint site.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background on Teams panels
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators can upload and set custom background images for Teams panels through the Teams admin center, enabling them to reflect their organization's branding. This feature will be available for Teams Rooms Pro and Teams Shared Devices licensed panels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Administrative Units for Teams Administration
CurrentVersion.description: We are excited to announce the availability of administrative units (AUs) for Teams administration. AUs are a way to delegate admin roles and delegate administration to a subset of users in your organization, based on attributes such as department, location, or business unit. With AUs, you can create more granular and flexible management scenarios for your Teams environment. You can assign the following roles, allowing them to manage only the users, groups & devices within their AU: Teams Administrator Teams Device Administrator Teams Communication Administrator Teams Communication Support Engineer Teams Communication Support Specialist Teams Telephony Administrator

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Choose custom images as icons for resources in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Operators will be able to add custom images as icons to links located in resources in Viva Connections!

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Playlist Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows tenant admins to create a card for a playlist to be accessed from the Viva Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Barriers v2 support for all new onboarding customers
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Information Barriers v2 (IB v2) is now available for all new onboarding customers. IB v2 has enhanced architecture which enables the following new features:

Large-scale segment support: The segment limit in organizations has increased to 5,000.
Multi-segment support: Users can be assigned to up to 10 segments.
Flexible user discoverability: Organizations can now choose to allow IB-protected users to discover each other while adhering to IB communication and collaboration policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Windows app - New protected virtual printer
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the new virtual printer for OneNote Windows app, built on top of the Microsoft IPP class print driver. This printer will be compliant and functional with Widows Protected Print (WPP) mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner App for Teams in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Planner app in Teams is a single, unified work management experience. It brings together the simplicity of To Do, the collaboration of Planner and the power of Project for the web into a single and simple solution, that offers individual task management, collaborative work management as well as enterprise work management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Loop components in Teams chat for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Loop components in Teams chat allow end users to send a message with a table, action items or a list that can be co-authored and edited by everyone in line.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web settings. If a reset is done in web, this will affect the account across Outlook.
